titleStmt.title: Some reflections on a late book, called The golden age, &c. Directed to the bookseller, in New-Inn, in Witch-street, without Temple-Bar, for R.G. By Eugenius Philalethes Junr.
titleStmt.author: Samber, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and are to be sold by A. Baldwin, at the Oxford-Arms, in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: A response to: The golden age, or, The reign of Saturn review'd.
Caption title on p. 3 reads: Some reflections, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
